page.title: 04Getting ready for school.
page.content: One fine morning I woke up sleepily and read my comic called the {Beano.}Then my mum came up with some orange.I finished my drink and then I went to the bathroom to wash my self.After I had finished in the bathroom I went to get dressed.I slipped on my shoes and combed my hair.I went down stairs and had my breakfast.For breakfast I had {cornflakes}and{hot buttered toast.}I got my bag ready for school.My bag contained my lunch and games kit.I set off for school on my bike.My bike is called a{Micron 5}which has 5 gears. When I got to school I put my bike in the bike sheds.I went to the playground. The whistle blew and the { red board}went up so I walked in the classroom.I put my bags in the cloakroom.{Mr.Flux}did the register then we started maths.At{10.10}play.
